com.aurel.track.admin.customize.category.filter.execute.loadItems

Class ReportBeanLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.admin.customize.category.filter.execute.loadItems.ReportBeanLoader

  • public class ReportBeanLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers a lot of methods to get a specific set of issues, based on given criteria. It offers utility methods to construct Torque Criteria objects that are helpful when filtering for issues.

    • Method Detail

      • getReportBean

        public static ShowableWorkItem getReportBean(TWorkItemBean workItemBean,
                             java.lang.Integer personID,
                             java.util.Locale locale)
        Prepares an issue ready for display from a standard TWorkItemBean. The TWorkItemBean contains references to other entities like priorities and statuses, rather then the strings like "high" or "hoch". This method replaces the references by proper localized strings and returns a bean that can directly be used for display purposes. Fields that are not supported are set to "Unavailable".
        Parameters:
        workItemBean - the bean to be prepared for display
        personID - in case this person must not see certain fields
        locale - the locale to be used for displayed strings
        Returns:
